resources.string: Have you checked all the tasks?
I felt hurried or rushed when completing this task
It was important to complete this task quickly
Overall, I thought this was a difficult task
I am satisfied with steps I took to find information
I forgot my immediate surroundings during the task
I was so involved that I ignored everything around me
I was so involved that I lost track of time
I was absorbed in my search task
I found enough information about the search topic
I am satisfied with the information I found
As a participant of this experiment you will receive a series of tasks to perform during the day
A notification will be sent to you every time a new task is available, complete the task as soon as you can. Star the resources that helped you
Remember also to do every questionnaire, that will help us analyze the data. For any problem please contact us and make sure to have enabled all the permissions
Please try to do as many task as possible, your contribution is fundamental for the outcome of this research

Tap START TASK to begin. You will first be asked to complete a short pre-task questionnaire. After completing the questionnaire, perform as many searches as necessary and tap the END TASK button when you are finished.

Start searching to find relevant information about the given task. Please submit as many queries as you need to complete the task. Press End Task whenever you feel confident that you have found all relevant information.
Now answer this short survey to familiarise yourself with the app
Just one more step, tap the end task button and you will have successfully completed the task
